About the Company: Gujarat State Fertilisers & Chemicals (GSFC) Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of fertilizers and industrial products.GSFC has created more than 24 brands of fertilizers, petrochemicals, chemicals, industrial gases, plastics, fibers and other products.The company`s product range includes Industrial Products- Under this they manufacture Anhydrous Ammonia, Argon Gas, Caprolactam, Melamine, Methyl Ethyl Ketoxime, Nylon-6, Oleum and Sulphuric Acid.Agro products- In this segment the company manufactures a range of fertiliser, bio-fuels and seeds.Biotech products- The Company manufactures range of biotech products under various brands such as Sardargib, Sardar Eco Green, Sardarvam, Sardartrap and Sardarlures, Sardarneem, Sardaramin and Sardaramin Granules..The company also engagged in the business of Fertilizer Products, Industries Products.
